TEXT: #yBooster cards are a core mechanic for #yM10 #yRobot that can augment how #bother #bcards function. NL NL To equip a #yBooster card, #yRight #yClick it while it is in your hand.
There is no limit to the amount of #yBoosters that can be on a card, so have fun experimenting with various combinations!
Cards which have #yBoosters equipped will have their name change color. NL NL You can #bLeft #bClick on the #yEnergy #yIcon of the card view/unequip the actively equipped #yBosters.

#yModule cards are similar to #yBoosters but instead augment how the #bplayer functions. NL NL To equip a #yModule card, #yRight #yClick it while it is in your hand while you have a free #yModule #ySlot.
You may #bLeft #bClick your #yModular #yBody power to view and/or unquip your equipped modules, sending them to your #yDiscard #yPile.
LABEL: Boosters & Modules
